verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> grievous <S%G5467><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> will come. <S%G1764><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> men <S%G444><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> lovers of self, <S%G5367><s%> lovers of money, <S%G5366><s%> boastful, <S%G213><s%> arrogant, <S%G5244><s%> blasphemers, <S%G989><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%> unthankful, <S%G884><s%> unholy, <S%G462><s%>
without natural affection, <S%G794><s%> unforgiving, <S%G786><s%> slanderers, <S%G1228><s%> without self-control, <S%G193><s%> fierce, <S%G434><s%> no lovers of good, <S%G865><s%>
traitors, <S%G4273><s%> headstrong, <S%G4312><s%> conceited, <S%G5187><s%> lovers of pleasure <S%G5369><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> lovers of God; <S%G5377><s%>

holding <S%G2192><s%> a form <S%G3446><s%> of godliness, <S%G2150><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> having denied <S%G720><s%> its <S%G846><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%> Turn away <S%G665><s%> from <S%G665><s%> these, <S%G5128><s%> also.

For <S%G1063><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> people who creep <S%G1744><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> houses, <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> take captive <S%G162><s%> gullible women <S%G1133><s%> loaded <S%G4987><s%> down with sins, <S%G266><s%> led away <S%G71><s%> by various <S%G4164><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%>
always <S%G3842><s%> learning, <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> never <S%G3368><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

Even <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5158><s%> Jannes <S%G2389><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jambres <S%G2387><s%> opposed <S%G436><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> do <S%G436><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> oppose <S%G436><s%> the truth; <S%G225><s%> men <S%G444><s%> corrupted <S%G2704><s%> in mind, <S%G3563><s%> who concerning <S%G4012><s%> the faith, <S%G4102><s%> are rejected. <S%G96><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> they will proceed <S%G4298><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> further. <S%G4119><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> folly <S%G454><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> evident <S%G1552><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G5613><s%> as theirs <S%G1565><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came to be. <S%G1096><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> did follow <S%G3877><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> teaching, <S%G1319><s%> conduct, <S%G72><s%> purpose, <S%G4286><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> steadfastness, <S%G5281><s%>

persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> and sufferings: <S%G3804><s%> those things that <S%G3634><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Iconium, <S%G2430><s%> and <S%G1722><s%> Lystra. <S%G3082><s%> I endured <S%G5297><s%> those <S%G3634><s%> persecutions. <S%G1375><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Out of <S%G1537><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

Yes, <S%G1161><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who desire <S%G2309><s%> to live <S%G2198><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> will suffer persecution. <S%G1377><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> impostors <S%G1114><s%> will grow <S%G4298><s%> worse and worse, <S%G5501><s%> deceiving <S%G4105><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> being deceived. <S%G4105><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have been assured of, <S%G4104><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> you have learned them. <S%G3129><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G575><s%> infancy, <S%G1025><s%> you have known <S%G1492><s%> the holy <S%G2413><s%> Scriptures <S%G1121><s%> which are able <S%G1410><s%> to make <S%G4679><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> wise <S%G4679><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> is God-breathed <S%G2315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> profitable <S%G5624><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> teaching, <S%G1319><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> reproof, <S%G1650><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> correction, <S%G1882><s%> and for <S%G4314><s%> instruction <S%G3809><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> complete, <S%G739><s%> thoroughly equipped <S%G1822><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>
